articles.title: CDC testing requirements for UK travelers are like 'a chain link fence to keep out a mosquito,' experts say - CNN International
articles.description: The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has announced new testing requirements for travelers arriving from the UK, but research by the agency's own scientists shows the rule may have only a small impact on the spread of the new UK strain of coronavi…
